feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for the United States Issued by the National Weather Service

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 6:44AM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Elevated Surf From Utqiagvik East Tonight Into Friday... Northwest winds increasing to 20 mph along the Arctic Coast near Utqiagvik tonight will continue into Thursday and spread east along the Arctic coast. Winds will then turn west on Thursday night and continue into Friday. This will likely cause elevated surf along the Arctic Coast at Utqiagvik from this evening through
entry.cap:areaDesc: Central Beaufort Sea Coast; Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast; Northern Arctic Coast

entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued September 19 at 9:56AM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT DUE TO ELEVATED PARTICULATE MATTER LEVELS FROM WINDBLOWN DUST... The Imperial County APCD has issued an air quality alert due to increased particulate matter from blowing dust. The air quality alert is in effect Wednesday afternoon and evening. In areas directly impacted by high levels of windblown dust, limit

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 12:59PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Larimer County through 145 PM MDT... At 1259 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northwest of Livermore, or 21 miles northwest of Fort Collins, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County; Larimer and Boulder Counties Between 6000 and 9000 Feet

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 3:21PM EDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN PASCO... NORTHWESTERN PINELLAS AND NORTHWESTERN HILLSBOROUGH COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 321 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Palm Harbor, or near Holiday. The strong thunderstorm is nearly stationary.

entry.title: Air Quality Alert issued September 18 at 11:20AM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...AIR QUALITY ALERT IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT WEDNESDAY... Oregon Department of Environmental Quality has issued an Air Pollution Advisory...in effect until at least Wednesday night. Wildfires burning in the region combined with forecast conditions will cause air quality levels to fluctuate and could be at unhealthy levels.
